label.text: Which of these sectors apply to your business?

hint.text: This includes construction, energy and utilities, farming and agriculture, forestry, waste management and other infrastructure, railway services, street and highway services
This includes manufacturing and chemical plants, food and other large processing plants, warehouses, distribution centres, port operations
This includes engineering centres, clean rooms, prototyping centres, wet labs, wind tunnels, computer labs, simulators, material development labs, specialist testing rooms
This includes (not an exhaustive list) repair services, fitters, meter readers, plumbers, cleaners, cooks, surveyors, delivery drivers who come to the door
This includes restaurants and pubs operating as take-aways, bars, cafes, food to go, food delivery, takeaways and mobile catering, contract catering
This includes all types of shops that are currently closed

items.text: Vehicles - working in or from a vehicle

hint.text: This includes couriers, mobile workers, lorry drivers, on-site transit, work vehicles, field forces
